issue.title: How to query if robot is initialized

content.html:
Pull request #79 adds a new message which publishes the harness state on /srcsim/finals/harness and will be available during the finals. Teams can use it to know when the harness has been completely detached.

@rmerriam , that pull request also makes it so the task message is also published while the robot is in the start box, in which case the checkpoint number in the message is 0. The moment the last checkpoint of a task is completed, one last message is published which has finished == true and the checkpoint number is <total CP> + 1.

Worth mentioning that on pull request #69 a score message is being published, and that contains the results for all previous checkpoints, including from previous tasks. That's another way to know where you currently are at.
